VisualizationStep Index¶

class VisualizationStep(traceForStep)¶

classes for the visualization steps

Arguments:
  • traceForStep (Trace) – the trace object correspond to a single step
VisualizationStep.difference(next)¶

calculate the difference between the current step and the next step

Arguments:
  • next (VisualizationStep) – the next step
VisualizationStep.equals(OtherVisualizationStep)¶

checks if the current VisualizationStep is equal to the other VisualizationStep

Arguments:
  • OtherVisualizationStep (VisualizationStep) – the other VisualizationStep that will be compared to the current VisualizationStep
VisualizationStep.getLinkedListForStep()¶

gets the linked list for this step

VisualizationStep.getPointersForStep()¶

gets the pointers for this step

VisualizationStep.getStepCode()¶

gets the code for this step

VisualizationStep.getStepCodeLineNumber()¶

returns the current step code line number
